casebody.data:
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON f/k/a The Bank of New York, etc., Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Sarah G. LAKS and Edward Einhorn, Defendants-Petitioners,
and
PNC Bank National Association, and State of New Jersey, Defendants. C-969 September Term 2017
080805 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 22, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005564-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
